Here are some of the course projects I’ve worked on from the Coursera Data Science Specialisation

Thesis

I obtained my PhD in experimental high energy physics from the University of Toronto in 2013. Most of my work focused on the Forward Calorimeter of the ATLAS detector at CERN. A pdf version of my thesis can be found here, the source has been uploaded to github.
